devdoc.author: Nicolas Frega - <frega.nicolas@gmail.com> Allows Medical Record System to maintain records of patients in their network. Records can be accessed by Hospitals if and only if patient provides name. Patients are rewarded with erc20 tokens for providing their name

addHospital(address).details: Allows to add a new hospital in the network.

addName(uint256,string).details: Allows a patient to add their name to the record in the network.

params._recordID: ID of the patient specific record.

addPatient(address).details: Allows to add a new patient in the network.

addRecord(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: Allows to add a patient record in the network.

params._hospital: address of the hospital for record.
params._patientAddress: address of the patient for record.
params._visitReason: internal code for reason for visit.

getCurrentPatients(uint256,uint256).details: Allows a Hospital to view the number of patients on a given date range.

getRecord(uint256,address).details: Allows a Hospital to retrieve the record for a patient.

params._patientAddress: address of the patient for record.
params._recordID: ID of the patient specific record.

getRecordByName(string).details: Allows a Hospital to view the number of records for a patient.

removeHospital(address).details: Allows to remove a hospital in the network.

removePatient(address).details: Allows to remove a patient in the network.

setSpringTokenReward(uint256).details: the amount of Spring token rewards for providing name.

params._tokenReward: Amount of tokens to reward patient.
